_source.short_desc: Our system gives you the ability to send over 3,000 alerts per minute ensuring your calls and texts will be received nearly immediately
_source.long_desc: DialMyCalls lets you easily send thousands of phone calls, text messages (SMS), and emails emergency notifications to a group of people in seconds. Best of all unlike competitors there are NO SETUP or HIDDEN FEES, you can also try out our system completely free.  No hardware required; access your account from any computer, smartphone, or even toll-free number to broadcast messages when you need to.  See why over 40,000 organizations use DialMyCalls.
_source.pricing_details:
DialMyCalls offer both monthly and pay-as-you-go plans. Discounts are available for schools, churches, and non-profits.  
Pay-as-you-go plans start at $10 for 140 credits, and are based on the number of credits required. One credit equals one text message or 30 seconds of call time:
140 credits: $10
380 credits: $25
825 credits: $50
1800 credits: $100
5000 credits: $250
11000 credits: $500
25000 credits: $999.99
Volume packages are available for customers requiring more than 25000 credits.
Monthly plans start at $7.49/month and are based on number of phone numbers required:
1-25 phone numbers: $7.49/month
25-50 phone numbers: $14.99/month
51-100 phone numbers: $34.99/month
101-200 phone numbers: $54.99/month
201-300 phone numbers: $74.99/month
301-400 phone numbers: $84.99/month
401-500 phone numbers: $94.99/month
Volume packages are available for customers requiring more than 500 phone numbers.
_source.target_audience: We're used by businesses, churches, sports teams, non profits, utility companies, and many different types of groups.  Basically anyone who has a group of people that need to be notified.

category_features.name: Contact Management
category_features.definition: Store and find contact information such as names, addresses, and social media accounts

category_features.name: Geotargeting
category_features.definition: Geographic location of visitors determines behavior of the software

category_features.name: Mass Notifications
category_features.definition: Send messages to multiple recipients at the same time

category_features.name: Scenario Planning
category_features.definition: Outline potential variations of future development and identify risks and opportunities within each

category_features.name: Templates
category_features.definition: Sample files or documents that could be customized as needed or used as is

category_features.name: Two-Way Communication
category_features.definition: Send, receive, and respond to messages

category_features.name: Automatic Call Distribution
category_features.definition: Distribute/route calls across call center employees

category_features.name: Call Recording
category_features.definition: Record the audio of phone conversations for quality assurance purposes

category_features.name: Call Scripting
category_features.definition: Provide agents with a typical response for common call subject matter

category_features.name: Campaign Management
category_features.definition: Create a collection of marketing actions to complete specific goals

category_features.name: Power Dialer
category_features.definition: System automatically dials the next number on the contact list after the previous call ends

category_features.name: Predictive Dialer
category_features.definition: System calls multiple numbers at once and connects the agent to the first number that answers

category_features.name: Preview Dialer
category_features.definition: System provides callee information to agent prior to the call to help determine whether or not to make the call

category_features.name: Progressive Dialer
category_features.definition: System makes individual calls from a list as soon as the agent is available

category_features.definition: A list of events with their respective dates

category_features.definition: Gauge satisfaction and receive information for improvement and success

related_products.short_desc: Opsgenie is a modern incident management and response solution for operating always-on services.
related_products.features: Opsgenie is a modern incident management and response solution for operating always-on services. We empower Dev and Ops teams to plan for service disruptions and stay in control during incidents. Opsgenie centralizes alerts, notifies the right people reliably, and enables them to take rapid action. Our deep integrations with 200+ ITSM tools enable you to break down silos between Dev and IT Teams, correlate incidents to code deployments, and easily measure the full impact of a major incident.

related_products.short_desc: EZ Texting delivers the smartest, fastest, easiest, and most reliable ways to connect with your customers and clients.
related_products.features: EZ Texting is a SaaS company that delivers the fastest, easiest, and most reliable way to connect. It has served over 165,000 customers and is the #1 SMS platform for business users, setting the standard for business texting. Our messaging solutions allow businesses to quickly and effectively reach and engage their mobile audiences. With employees around the world, EZ Texting is continuously recognized as a Best Place to Work, as well as a top product for small and mid-market businesses.

related_products.short_desc: iLobby adds an extra level of security to your organization with mass emergency notifications and unauthorized visitor alerts.
related_products.features: Automate mass emergency notifications and headcount reports to security and management personnel. iLobby makes visitor and employee tracking easy. From data security to physical security, iLobby is trusted in high security facilities such as airports and banks. Enjoy enterprise features, integrations, multi-location management, watchlists, SOC2, ITAR, GDPR. Used by Fortune 500, airports, banks, and SMBs.

related_products.short_desc: ePACT EHR & emergency network lets you reach members in real-time via 4 channels and track customized responses on a dashboard.
related_products.features: ePACT EHR & emergency network helps you reach members in real-time - wherever they are.  ePACT is a secure, HIPAA compliant, cloud-based, health and emergency platform. Send 2-way real-time notifications by 4 channels: text, voice, email and roll call response. Track responses on a dashboard, to be sure everyone is accounted for. Customize multi-level response options to track detailed responses such as need for assistance.

related_products.short_desc: Voice, text and email broadcasting system designed to help group leaders communicate efficiently with members.
related_products.features: Voice, text and email broadcasting system designed to help group leaders communicate efficiently with members.

related_products.short_desc: Multichannel emergency communication software that provides two-way messaging, integrated threat intelligence, and safety monitoring.
related_products.features: AlertMedia is an emergency notification software supported by companion mobile apps. AlertMedia allows you to engage in real-time, two-way interactions with any size audience in seconds. Our easy-to-use interface enables you to communicate with your employees and associated audiences via text, voice, email, app push notifications, social, conference call, and custom channels while getting real-time reports and insight. It's modern, reliable, and secure.

related_products.short_desc: The leading critical communication and data platform trusted to help save lives.
related_products.features: The leading FedRAMP-authorized mass notification system enabling higher education institutions, corporations and healthcare organizations, K-12 schools and federal, state and local governments to quickly and reliably send messages in just three clicks via text, email, voice, desktop, social media, CAP, IoT devices and more.

related_products.short_desc: Public safety, incident reporting, & security management solutions for law enforcement, education, healthcare, gaming, and hospitality.
related_products.features: Omnigo Software is the leading provider of public safety, incident reporting, and security management solutions for law enforcement, education, healthcare, gaming, hospitality, and other enterprises, offering easy-to-use applications that provide actionable insight for making more informed decisions. Over 2,000 customers trust Omnigo solutions to help law enforcement and security professionals secure their organizations property, protect against revenue loss, and ensure safer tomorrows.

related_products.short_desc: Regroup is the most trusted name in emergency notification systems. Reach your entire network quickly and securely with Regroup.
related_products.features: Regroup is the trusted mass communication solution that keeps people safe and informed. Our award-winning platform sends emergency and day-to-day communications to millions each day. With one-tap messaging to multiple channels, Regroup helps you mitigate risk, respond to critical events and enable those in your network to reach out when in need. Regroup's robust cloud-based platform delivers to email, mobile, text/SMS - even when cellular service is hobbled or power is down.

related_products.short_desc: Easy-to-use and reliable SMS Service for sending mass text messages, text auto-responders, SMS lead generation and more.
related_products.features: TextMarks SMS Text Messaging service allows brands, retailers, small businesses, transit agencies, nonprofits and corporate enterprises to reach prospects, customers & employees through mass text messaging. Since 2006, TextMarks easy to use web interface, robust API &reliable service have enabled thousands of customers to build their businesses, increase engagement and deliver timely information to more than 10 Million users in the U.S. Visit www.textmarks.com or call 800-696-1393 to learn more.

similar_products.short_desc: Emergency notification software for businesses of all sizes to easily send multi-channel, real-time alerts when seconds count
similar_products.features: Save money, time - and lives - with RedFlag, the easy-to-use, multi-channel emergency mass notification system. Send real-time alerts and critical information via text, email, voice and MS Teams in one click to any-size groups starting at only $0.60/user per month. Our industry-leading alert software can be used by small to enterprise corporations to send mass alerts, gain visibility into events happening in the field, efficiently coordinate resources, and make smart, data-informed decisions.

similar_products.short_desc: OnSolve One Call Now is a simple critical communications software for businesses to broadcast emergency alerts, send routine alerts.
similar_products.features: OnSolve's One Call Now, one of our market-leading critical communications products, enables groups and organizations of all sizes and types to quickly, securely and reliably distribute critical information to large numbers of people on virtually any device and network. OnSolve sends over two billion notifications annually and has provided more than 60 years of proven support to both the public and private sectors. We are in the business of helping our customers proactively keep people informed.

similar_products.short_desc: Hyper-Reach is the easy-to-use, cost-effective mass notification system for emergencies, critical events & routine communications.
similar_products.features: Hyper-Reach is the mass notification system for public safety and employees in government, education, and business. Quickly send emergency, critical event and routine communication to 1000's of people by phone, text, email, push notification, RSS, smart speakers & more. Rated one of the easiest to use systems, Hyper-Reach features a mobile app, IPAWS, Google Maps, advanced language support, message templates, dynamic lists, UKG HR software integration, awesome 24/7 customer support and more.

similar_products.short_desc: From Airport Operators to Manufacturing Companies and Academic Institutions, organisations trust Tekmon to reliably reach stakeholders.
similar_products.features:
Knowing the real-time location and keeping your people continuously informed of operational changes or critical events can be a challenge.

Tekmon Mass Notification is a cloud-based alert system that offers real-time registry and immediate two-way notifications to tens, hundreds or thousands of recipients over multiple locations, channels (Voice, SMS, email) and languages, for business updates or emergencies.
- Fair Pricing Model
- Same day implementation
- User friendly
- Flexible Integrations

similar_products.short_desc: Raptor Emergency Management software enables K-12 schools to confidently respond to any emergency, big or small.
similar_products.features: Raptor Emergency Management software helps K-12 schools prepare for, respond to, and recover from any emergency. The software system empowers schools to manage drills, initiate emergencies of any size on a mobile panic button, connect directly with 9-1-1 and share critical information with first responders, account for everyone on campus, and quickly reunify students with authorized guardians.

similar_products.short_desc: Whispir is a cloud platform for automating intelligent, rich communications.
similar_products.features: Whispir, Inc. is an all-in-one communications platform designed to help businesses and organizations communicate more humanly with their team and their customers. Whispir's capabilities include a wide range of intelligent messaging solutions, from SMS to email, voice, video, social, and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Business Continuity software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Business Continuity tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Business Continuity software helps organizations to identify threats and plan for the prevention and recovery of information assets. These applications protect key organizational data in the event of a failure and in the wake of trouble, aid the rapid restoration of system function and data access. Typically Business Continuity solutions offer options for continuous or scheduled monitoring along with a variety of real-time data recovery tools. Backup storage can be maintained locally or routed to a remote server. Business Continuity software is related to Database Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Compliance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Compliance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Compliance software enables an organization to monitor internal controls to ensure that standards and regulations are met. Compliance solutions that focus on financial and accounting compliance standards, such as the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, help organizations streamline financial documentation, audit trails, and reporting. Compliance solutions that focus on environmental compliance standards help organizations monitor and report on emissions, hazmat procedures, and regulatory policies. Compliance software is related to Accounting software, and EHS Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Environment, Health & Safety (EHS) Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Environment, Health & Safety (EHS) Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: EHS Management software streamlines reporting and information management to help companies maintain EHS compliance standards. EHS Management software helps to reduce risk, track and respond to incidents, and solve a variety of regulatory compliance challenges. Companies can accurately manage EHS information and report to compliance authorities. EHS Management software is related to Facility Management software, Government software, Quality Management software, and Maintenance Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top EMS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of EMS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: EMS (Emergency Medical Service) software includes a variety of applications that help EMS organizations in performing their daily duties, such as call taking, dispatching, personnel management and scheduling, patient care reporting and data collection. EMS Dispatch software is often web-based to allow access to data for both supervisors and employees. For additional software solutions see also Medical Scheduling software and Electronic Medical Records software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Incident Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Incident Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Incident Management software streamlines reporting on and resolving IT service issues as well as EHS and any security incidents in the field and across the organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Risk Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Risk Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Risk Management software helps organizations reduce exposure to enterprise and operational risks, improving quality and minimizing losses through better management of data. These solutions track incidents, facilitate evaluation of corrective actions, monitor enterprise-level performance, and promote compliance. Business intelligence and exception management are typical features of Risk Management software. For related software solutions see Financial Risk Management software and Compliance software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Safety Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Safety Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Safety Management software enables companies to improve workplace health and safety by identifying and managing safety risks, tracking nonconformances, assigning corrective and preventive actions, providing the tools for employee training and injury recordkeeping.
